unnormalised: **Exam Prep Apps: The Secret Biryani Recipe for Success?**
normalised: **Exam Prep Apps: The Secret Biryani Recipe for Success?**

unnormalised: Exam season stressing you out, yaar? Ditch the late-night chai and paratha, and check out the boom in exam prep apps! From JEE Main to UPSC, there's an app for practically every exam under the Indian sun.
normalised: Exam season stressing you out, yaar? Ditch the late-night chai and paratha, and check out the boom in exam prep apps! From J E E Main to U P S C, there's an app for practically every exam under the Indian sun.

unnormalised: Students in Kota, Delhi, and even remote villages are ditching bulky textbooks for these digital wonders. Imagine learning complex theorems while waiting for your mom's delicious Onam sadhya!
normalised: Students in Kota, Delhi, and even remote villages are ditching bulky textbooks for these digital wonders. Imagine learning complex theorems while waiting for your mom's delicious Onam sadhya!

unnormalised: Apps like ExamGuru and TestWala are offering everything from mock tests mirroring the real thing to personalized learning paths. Forget rote learning; these apps promise concept clarity and instant doubt-solving.
normalised: Apps like ExamGuru and TestWala are offering everything from mock tests mirroring the real thing to personalized learning paths. Forget rote learning; these apps promise concept clarity and instant doubt-solving.

unnormalised: Some even gamify the whole process with leaderboards and virtual rewards, making studying less of a chore and more of a friendly competition. One student from IIT-Bombay says these apps helped him "nail the MCQ section" with ease.
normalised: Some even gamify the whole process with leaderboards and virtual rewards, making studying less of a chore and more of a friendly competition. One student from I I T-Bombay says these apps helped him "nail the M C Q section" with ease.

unnormalised: But are they *really* the magic bullet? Well, nothing replaces hard work, but they’re certainly a handy tool in your arsenal. So, download, explore, and ace those exams! Just don't forget to celebrate with some well-deserved biryani afterward.
normalised: But are they *really* the magic bullet? Well, nothing replaces hard work, but they’re certainly a handy tool in your arsenal. So, download, explore, and ace those exams! Just don't forget to celebrate with some well-deserved biryani afterward.
